duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and extract samples for analysis
Run initial calibration, daily QC, and MBs for an analytical method for a matrix
Understand basic QC requirements for at least one analytical method for analysis
Keep good recordkeeping for analytical sequence and updates logbook daily
Load samples on auto sampler for at least two analytical batches for both soil and aqueous matrix
Produce data, conduct a detailed review, and enter data into LIMS
Report level 2 data package with limited errors
Perform basic maintenance of the instrument/auto sampler
Learn additional analytical methods, advanced data reporting, and increase productivity for additional analytical batches when time permits

education_certification.credential: 1-2 years of experience, no degree required, some college level sciences classes preferred
